link.script:

p.strong: All students and their siblings are being offered free breakfast and lunch.
Breakfast and Lunch Service Resumes April 20

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.h3: Walter J. Kappeler, Jr. (Chief School Administrator)

p.strong: Our April 21st Board Meeting will be Held Online
Join virtually at 7:00 pm with the following information:

div.data-code: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/S1DXlbCSc1k" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

div.p: If you have access to email, that is a great way to get in touch with any of our staff members. If you can't find what you are looking for on our website, please email info@mrtes.com.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc

hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Please click on the intent to enroll form if you are planning on registering your 3 or 4 year old for the 2020-2021 school year. You do not need to fill out this form if your child is currently a part of our preschool program.
